aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Passionate developer and designer creating beautiful, functional digital experiences.
aboutMe.bio1: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in building scalable web applications.
aboutMe.bio2: My expertise spans across the entire stack, from crafting pixel-perfect user interfaces with React and Tailwind to architecting robust backend systems with Node.js and Go.
aboutMe.philosophy: I believe that code should be as beautiful as the design it implements. Clean, maintainable, and efficient code is my trademark.
aboutMe.goal: To help businesses transform their ideas into powerful, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
